76.movie_plot: An inventor spurns his city life to move his family into the jungles of Central America to make a utopia.

39.movie_plot: A manipulative woman and a roguish man conduct a turbulent romance during the American Civil War and Reconstruction periods.

176.movie_plot: Convicted felon Nikita, instead of going to jail, is given a new identity and trained, stylishly, as a top secret spy/assassin.

107.movie_plot: A small-town boy obsessed with the Italian cycling team vies for the affections of a college girl.

69.movie_plot: Young Esteban wants to become a writer and also to discover the identity of his father, carefully concealed by his mother Manuela.

4.movie_plot: "The Dude" Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire Lebowski, seeks restitution for his ruined rug and enlists his bowling buddies to help get it.

29.movie_plot: Lieutenant John Dunbar, assigned to a remote western Civil War outpost, befriends wolves and Indians, making him an intolerable aberration in the military.

162.movie_plot: Earth is invaded by Martians with unbeatable weapons and a cruel sense of humor.

112.movie_plot: The centuries old vampire Count Dracula comes to England to seduce his barrister Jonathan Harker's fiancée Mina Murray and inflict havoc in the foreign land.

139.movie_plot: Jake Blues, just out from prison, puts together his old band to save the Catholic home where he and brother Elwood were raised.

135.movie_plot: The life and career of a legendary comedian, Andy Kaufman.

87.movie_plot: Spending the summer at a Catskills resort with her family, Frances "Baby" Houseman falls in love with the camp's dance instructor, Johnny Castle.

1.movie_plot: An unemployed single mother becomes a legal assistant and almost single-handedly brings down a California power company accused of polluting a city's water supply.

164.movie_plot: A British soldier kidnapped by IRA terrorists soon befriends one of his captors, who then becomes drawn into the soldier's world.

64.movie_name: Bridge on the River Kwai, The (1957)
64.movie_plot: After settling his differences with a Japanese PoW camp commander, a British colonel co-operates to oversee his men's construction of a railway bridge for their captors - while oblivious to a plan by the Allies to destroy it.

120.movie_plot: The staff of an army hospital in the Korean war find that laughter is the best way to deal with their situation.

167.movie_plot: Newlyweds are terrorized by demonic forces after moving into a large house that was the site of a grisly mass murder a year before.

104.movie_plot: A convicted rapist, released from prison after serving a fourteen-year sentence, stalks the family of the lawyer who originally defended him.

24.movie_plot: The incredible story of Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart, told by his peer and secret rival Antonio Salieri - now confined to an insane asylum.

148.movie_plot: A man robs a bank to pay for his lover's operation; it turns into a hostage situation and a media circus.

113.movie_plot: Carrie White, a shy, friendless teenage girl who is sheltered by her domineering, religious mother, unleashes her telekinetic powers after being humiliated by her classmates at her senior prom.

131.movie_plot: 57 years later, Ellen Ripley is rescued by a deep salvage team during her hypersleep. The moon from the original movie has been colonized, but contact is lost. This time, colonial marines have impressive firepower, but will that be enough?

52.movie_plot: An American reporter goes to the Australian outback to meet an eccentric crocodile poacher and invites him to New York City.

98.movie_plot: Holden and Banky are comic book artists. Everything's going good for them until they meet Alyssa, also a comic book artist. Holden falls for her, but his hopes are crushed when he finds out she's a lesbian.

189.movie_plot: To amuse themselves at a weekly dinner, a few well-heeled folk each bring a dimwit along who is to talk about his pastime. Each member seeks to introduce a champion dumbbell. Pierre, an ...

25.movie_name: Like Water for Chocolate (Como agua para chocolate) (1992)
25.movie_plot: When tradition prevents her from marrying the man she loves, a young woman discovers she has a unique talent for cooking.

156.movie_plot: A violent, suspended police detective investigates a brutal murder, in which a manipulative and seductive woman could be involved.

184.movie_plot: On the hottest day of the year on a street in the Bedford-Stuyvesant section of Brooklyn, everyone's hate and bigotry smolders and builds until it explodes into violence.

19.movie_plot: A research team is sent to the Jurassic Park Site B island to study the dinosaurs there while another team approaches with another agenda.

93.movie_plot: A film of the early years of the reign of Elizabeth I of England and her difficult task of learning what is necessary to be a monarch.

51.movie_name: Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid (1969)
51.movie_plot: Two Western bank/train robbers flee to Bolivia when the law gets too close.

3.movie_plot: A man afraid to fly must ensure that a plane lands safely after the pilots become sick.

127.movie_plot: After being exiled from the most advanced town in post apocalyptic Australia, a drifter travels with a group of abandoned children to rebel against the town's queen.

95.movie_plot: A New York City doctor, who is married to an art curator, pushes himself on a harrowing and dangerous night-long odyssey of sexual and moral discovery after his wife admits that she once almost cheated on him.

21.movie_plot: When his secret bride is executed for assaulting an English soldier who tried to rape her, Sir William Wallace begins a revolt against King Edward I of England.

180.movie_plot: Best friends and their daughters holiday in Rio only for one to fall for the other's daughter.

134.movie_plot: James Bond willingly falls into an assassination ploy involving a naive Russian beauty in order to retrieve a Soviet encryption device that was stolen by SPECTRE.

108.movie_plot: The scientist father of a teenage girl and boy accidentally shrinks his and two other neighborhood teens to the size of insects. Now the teens must fight diminutive dangers as the father searches for them.

124.movie_plot: Humanity finds a mysterious, obviously artificial object buried beneath the Lunar surface and, with the intelligent computer H.A.L. 9000, sets off on a quest.

101.movie_plot: Two drag performers and a transgender woman travel across the desert to perform their unique style of cabaret.

159.movie_plot: In the future, a sadistic gang leader is imprisoned and volunteers for a conduct-aversion experiment, but it doesn't go as planned.

32.movie_plot: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

182.movie_plot: In the midst of a searing Florida heat wave, a woman persuades her lover, a small-town lawyer, to murder her rich husband.

116.movie_plot: A collection of animated interpretations of great works of Western classical music.

188.movie_plot: A semi-fictional account of life as a professional Football (American-style) player. Loosely based on the Dallas Cowboys team of the early 1970s.
